Checked, single-breasted jacket woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
